sub_title:
Co-Founder and Managing Director at InDomo, a WPP company.
Professor of Growth Hacking at the ESCP Business School in London.

Advisory Board Member at WeAre8.
summary:
Digital Performance Marketing, Consumer marketing & business management executive with >20 years of experience across Brand development/Managment, Advertising, Integrated Marketing, Digital, CRM, eCommerce & Business Development, including bringing IN-HOUSE solutions for Media & Content, that we called RTMC ( Real Time Marketing Center) driving continuous ROI Improvement.

Solid track record of >15 years in Digital & eCommerce, strategy, marketing and business management and >5 years experience in IN-HOUSE SOLUTIONS for marketing performance, including, Strategy, Media, Creatives, Content/Assets, Analytics, CRM, with focus on Social, Paid Search, Programmatic, and Retail Paid search.

I have effectively built IN_HOUSE a multi-disciplinary, high-performing team of > 80 marketing experts, digital Marketing / eCommerce & Media/Creative specialists driving growth trough real time optimization based on data and analytics.

My management says that I am an entrepreneurial executive who has fully integrated digital and traditional marketing, sales & business capabilities; as such, my value extends well beyond digital. 
Integrated Growth Hacking, Growth team, Agile and Scrum in the organization to drive IN-HOUSE solutions for profitable growth trough rapid test and learn culture 

Working closely with USA, DACH, EU, LATAM, CEE, MET, CHINA, APAC, JAPAN and INDIA.

Proven growth creator:

At Philips,
In 12 years I built a team of >80 people, integrated digital & traditional advertising. We have changed the thinking around campaign creation & activation by building agencies capabilities IN-HOUSE, driving greater sales & much better ROI.  In my prior years,  I led development of Philips.com, Philips e-commerce, CRM, Search, Social & e-trade.

At Apple, 
I led effort that increased the eCommerce business, by combining analytics, digital marketing & promotional activities in weekly planning/optimization processes. I was also Category Manager of Accessories where we maximized Apple brand experience & doubled the size of the accessories business

At L’Oreal, 
I developed products/brands, introduced them globally, created and managed, with agencies, multi-million euro global 360 campaigns, & later managed local P&L & media plans/budgets.

For Expedia.com, 
I developed the Consumer Care European platform, managing 60+ people, shifting from cost-only objectives to improve consumer service & satisfaction objectives.

I am recognized as a visionary,  employing clear strategies / plans, and doing "whatever it takes" to deliver results and growth, and to transform organizations

treasury_media.title: Philips RTMC: Interview Marco Roncaglio, Lenze Boonstra

Interview & Presentation of the RTMC (Real Time Marketing Center) of Philips. 
In-House Performance Marketing, Media/Content capabilities.

education.field_of_study: Business, Management, Marketing, and Related Support Services

profile_positions.description:
InDomo designs together with clients bespoke in-house marketing & media performance solutions that drive business and brand performance. 

Core of the solutions is to progressively increase ROI by optimising audiences, channels, media and content focusing on digital performance channels.

www.in-domo.nl
profile_positions.title: Co-founder & Managing Director at InDomo

profile_positions.description: Professor at the Master in Managment at ESCP Business School in London. The Art and Science of Selling & Growth Hacking. This is 30 Hours course of the second semester that is part of the Marketing and entrepreneurship stream.
profile_positions.title: Professor Master in Managment @ ESCP Business School: The Art & Science of Selling & Growth hacking

profile_positions.description:
Role and Responsibilities
Responsible for driving Omni-channels go-to-market strategies, plans and programs, including Brand marketing, advertising and media, digital marketing, e-Commerce, CRM and “Real Time” digital performance IN-HOUSE Media & Content capabilities, to continuously improve marketing ROI.

Manage and guide implementation of a multi-million euro marketing budget in a Multi Billion Euro business.

Activities and Accomplishments:
- Built a team of 80+ Marketing, Digital Marketing, e-Commerce, CRM, Digital Media/Social Media and Shopper experts from scratch; work directly with top 15 Markets (U.S., EU, CEE, LATAM, China, India and rest of Asia). 

- Developed revolutionary IN-HOUSE new concept, “Real Time Marketing,” enabling major increases in marketing ROI based on data and deep analytics and IN-HOUSE agency capabilities around Strategy, Media, Creative, Analytics.

- Driving digital transformation and focusing on Growth, introducing  culture of rapid test and learn, developing growth hacking, growth teams. Introducing AGILE and SCRUM as part of culture.

- Develop winning global 360s advertising campaigns, integrating TV and traditional channels with digital, search, social and e-commerce touchpoint.

- Developed and executed Global Online Strategy for Personal Care Business Group, including Marketing Plan & Upstream Global Marketing campaigns for Product & Campaign launches. Provided Global Downstream Marketing/ Online Marketing & e-Commerce support through Local Activation plans.  

Conducted with Markets campaigns resulting + 20pt Market Share in Germany, +15pt in U.S., improved NPS by +15points in China. 

- Created CRM and Real-Time IN_HOSUE capabilities to impact campaigns while they’re happening, in order to increase Marketing ROI 2-5 times with a particular focus on developing e-commerce business with key retailers, especially with Amazon. Leading recently, data automation and A.I. to further drive marketing performance.
profile_positions.title: Senior Director Brand Activation, Digital & CRM at Philips

profile_positions.description:
Senior Director Digital & CRM 

Role and Responsibilities
Global Responsibility for driving digital marketing, sales and advertising spending productivity, managing a multi-million euro  marketing budget in a 2+B Euro business. 

Activities and Accomplishments
- Built a team of >30 Digital Marketing, eCommerce, Digital Media & Social Media specialists, from scratch.  
- Developed and executed Global Online Strategy for Personal Care Business Group, including Marketing Plan & Upstream Marketing for Product & Campaign launches.  Provided Global Downstream Online Marketing & eCommerce support and activation through Local Activation plans.  

-Key Achievements: 
improved Campaign ROI 3-fold in Key Markets; grew Market Share + 20pt Market Share in Germany, +15pt in US. Improved NPS by +15points in China.  Created Real-Time capabilities to impact campaigns while they’re happening, in order to increase Marketing spending Productivity 2-5 times with a particular focus on developing e-commerce business with key retailers, especially with Amazon and strategic partnership with Facebook, Instagram, Google, T-Mall and Amazon.
profile_positions.title: Senior Director Digital & CRM | Personal Care
Director Online Marketing & CRM  | Personal care

profile_positions.description:
Role and Responsibilities:
All Philips Consumer Businesses (10B+ Euros): responsible for online strategy and planning, web analytics, 
e-Commerce, direct sales, social media, Philips website & Philips e-shop, CRM, Search Marketing and e-Trade, including website and ecommerce performances/tracking and consumer surveys.

Activities & Accomplishments
-	Developed and executed first comprehensive digital strategy and Annual Operating Plan, working closely with Design, IT, Global Advertising Agencies and various Business Units. 
-	Developed globally Philips.com. Built development and activation team capabilities to enhance country communication and teamwork.
-	Grew e-commerce Philips Direct to Consumer business by strategizing/developing/launching New Global Philips Online Shop in 9 countries in 18 months. Managed 7 cross-functional work streams/50+ people to drive D2C Philips eCommerce.
profile_positions.title: Director Digital and e-Commerce | CMO office

profile_positions.description:
Marketing/ Merchandising manager for the ONLINE APPLE STORES in EMEA. ( 16 Countries).

Role and Responsibilities
- Soon after arriving at Apple, placed in charge of developing/executing the Marketing/Merchandising plan to maximise traffic, conversion and sales on all Apple Online Stores across Europe. (16 countries, 9 lang.). 
- Concurrently given sales and P&L responsibility for Apple’s Accessories Business, including all 3rd party accessories, comprising 200 Vendors relationships.  Subsequently, created a new source of profit, by aggregating and reselling refurbished products.
- Eventually responsible for Global and local sales promotion for E-commerce/online stores, Europe, Accessories, Category Manager, Refurbish business.  Managed a team of 8 people.

Activities and Accomplishments
Created double-digit growth annually in e-commerce; doubled size of the Accessories business; created a new category, the Refurbish Business that generated 25 MM euros in profit in year 1, while attracting new price-conscious consumers to the Apple franchise.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing & eCommerce Sr. Manager | eCommerce EMEA

profile_positions.description:
Professor of Marketing at the MEB: Master’s in European Business
“New Products Development” Course  during the academic year 2005/2006 and 2006/2007 at The International Business School ESCP- EAP in London. 
This activity as professor at the school was done while I was working at Apple

Created first integrated campaign, addressing both consumers and leading dermatologists.

profile_positions.description:
Roles, Responsibilities and Accomplishments
In charge of worldwide development of Facial Cleansing Brand and the major Facial “skin care” brands (Hydration, Anti-ageing and Radiance); developed in-depth knowledge of European Markets and consumers. Successfully introduced International Brands, extensions, managed multiple product launches, including a new brand for women under 30, called Oligo 25.  Renewed facial cleansing product range.  Maximized cash value of hydration product line.
